QuestData.Title: Tal'gurub
QuestData.Description: My prophet is a loyal servant, but he has his own ideas of how things must be.$b$bI am sending him to Tal'gurub to deal with a mess of his own making. One of his pupils, a witch doctor by de name of Vol'jamba, has taken de Gurubashi enclave as his own and has ousted my guards.$b$bMeet Zul at Tal'gurub and ensure dis nuisance is dealt with. Do not let him get... distracted.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet Zul the Prophet in Tal'gurub.
